definition: equivalent to 就可以/can then (do sth)/can immediately (do sth)/(do sth) and that will suffice
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: By exposing under different light filters, photographs with different image contrast can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 曝光时使用不同滤色镜即可获得影像反差不同的照片。

sentences.english: Has these four types, then got in the simple tea-oil tree.
sentences.chinese: 有这四样，即可打简易油茶了。

sentences.english: The dormancy of seed of M. robusta is broke if stratified for 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 低温层积80天即可解除八棱海棠种子休眠。

sentences.english: The train will be ready to leave when all the carriages have been coupled.
sentences.chinese: 在所有车厢都连接好时列车即可开出。

sentences.english: By the end of 2001, natural gas conveyer pipeline can be laid down to our factory.
sentences.chinese: 2001年底，天然气输送管道即可铺设至天津碱厂。

sentences.english: Add balsam pear, saute with medium heat until done, serve.
sentences.chinese: 最后加入苦瓜，以中火再炒拌至所有材料熟透即可。

sentences.english: Slippery after arriving by slope, can multiply telpher return slope top again.
sentences.chinese: 滑到坡底后即可乘缆车再次回到坡顶。

sentences.english: In High Profile, use your Armed button to unsheathe your sword.
sentences.chinese: 在高姿态时，用你的“武装”按键即可拔出你的剑。

sentences.english: Leave jewelery behind when you travel, and wear only a simple watch.
sentences.chinese: 旅行前先把珠宝留家里，只要带一般的表即可。

sentences.english: Re-righting the walkie-talkie, you can cancel the alarm.
sentences.chinese: 把对讲机重新扶正，即可取消报警。

sentences.english: Loosen but do not remove the subbase screws so that the subbase can move freely.
sentences.chinese: 松开但不要取出座垫固定螺丝，座垫活动了即可。

sentences.english: Stir in basil. Spoon curry over rice. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 拌入罗勒叶，把咖喱浇在饭上即可。

sentences.english: To me, it was just a matter of being candid with the resident natives.
sentences.chinese: 对于我来说，只需与当地居民坦诚相待即可。

sentences.english: The hydraulic damper only needs to be fixed on a door and a doorframe when used.
sentences.chinese: 使用时只需将它固定在门和门框上即可。

sentences.english: Satisfying security requirements without hamstringing programmers.
sentences.chinese: 无需程序员即可满足安全需求。

sentences.english: A pair of genes was recessiveness homozygote, it was probably to be ill.
sentences.chinese: 只要有一对基因隐性纯合时，即可患病。

definition: all are OK/both are OK/all can/both can/also can
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
